mapper.select: SELECT u.*, d.id did, d.name dname, d.leader_id dleaderid, d.location dlocation, d.status dstatus FROM user u, dept d WHERE username = #{username} AND u.dept_id = d.id

SELECT u.*, d.id did, d.name dname, d.leader_id dleaderid, d.location dlocation, d.status dstatus FROM user u, dept d WHERE u.dept_id = d.id AND u.username NOT IN( SELECT user_id FROM user_project WHERE project_id = #{projectId} )

SELECT u.*, d.id did, d.name dname, d.leader_id dleaderid, d.location dlocation, d.status dstatus FROM user u, dept d, user_block ub WHERE ub.block_id = #{blockId} AND ub.user_id = u.username AND u.dept_id = d.id

SELECT u.*, d.id did, d.name dname, d.leader_id dleaderid, d.location dlocation, d.status dstatus FROM user u, dept d WHERE u.dept_id = d.id AND u.username NOT IN( SELECT user_id FROM user_block WHERE block_id = #{0} ) AND u.username IN( SELECT user_id FROM user_project WHERE project_id = #{1} )
